name: Verbal Reasoning Assessment
description: Measures the ability to understand and evaluate written information. Suitable for professionals who need to make decisions based on verbal/written information.
skills: Critical thinking, language comprehension, analytical reasoning, information evaluation

name: Numerical Reasoning Assessment
description: Evaluates the ability to interpret numerical data and make logical decisions. Designed for roles involving financial analysis, data interpretation, and quantitative decision-making.
skills: Numerical ability, data interpretation, statistical analysis, problem-solving

name: Inductive Reasoning Assessment
description: Assesses logical thinking and pattern recognition ability. Ideal for roles requiring innovation, strategic thinking, and problem-solving.
skills: Pattern recognition, logical thinking, problem-solving, abstract reasoning

name: Mechanical Reasoning Assessment
description: Measures understanding of mechanical and physical principles. Targeted at engineering, technical, and maintenance roles.
skills: Mechanical aptitude, spatial visualization, applied physics, technical problem-solving

name: Coding Assessment for Python
description: Evaluates programming skills and problem-solving in Python. Designed for software developers, data scientists, and automation engineers.
skills: Python programming, algorithms, data structures, debugging, code efficiency

name: Leadership Competency Assessment
description: Evaluates leadership potential and management capabilities. Suitable for management roles and leadership development programs.
skills: Leadership, decision-making, team management, strategic thinking, conflict resolution

name: Customer Service Assessment
description: Assesses aptitude for customer-facing roles and service orientation. Ideal for support staff, account managers, and service representatives.
skills: Communication, empathy, problem resolution, patience, interpersonal skills

name: Excel Skills Assessment
description: Measures proficiency in Microsoft Excel for data analysis and reporting. Suitable for analysts, financial professionals, and administrative roles.
skills: Excel, data analysis, formula creation, pivot tables, data visualization

name: Personality Assessment
description: Measures work-related personality traits and behavioral tendencies. Used for cultural fit evaluation and team composition analysis.
skills: Self-awareness, workplace behavior, interpersonal style, motivation, stress management

name: Situational Judgement Test
description: Evaluates decision-making in realistic workplace scenarios. Appropriate for customer service, management, and team-based roles.
skills: Decision-making, workplace judgment, conflict resolution, prioritization

name: Data Science Assessment
description: Comprehensive evaluation of data science skills including statistics, machine learning, and data visualization. For data scientists and ML engineers.
skills: Statistical analysis, machine learning, Python, R, data visualization, feature engineering

name: Project Management Assessment
description: Evaluates project management capabilities including planning, execution, and stakeholder management. Designed for project managers and coordinators.
skills: Project planning, risk management, team coordination, stakeholder communication, resource allocation

name: Sales Aptitude Assessment
description: Measures sales potential and capabilities. Applicable for sales representatives, account managers, and business development roles.
skills: Persuasion, relationship building, negotiation, resilience, client needs assessment

name: DevOps Practices Assessment
description: Assesses knowledge and skills in DevOps methodologies and tools. For DevOps engineers and IT operations specialists.
skills: CI/CD, containerization, infrastructure as code, monitoring, automation scripting

name: Front-End Development Assessment
description: Evaluates skills in front-end web development including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. For UI developers and web designers.
skills: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, responsive design, front-end frameworks, web accessibility

name: General Cognitive Ability Test
description: Comprehensive assessment of cognitive abilities including verbal, numerical, and abstract reasoning. Suitable for graduate recruitment and high-potential identification.
skills: Problem-solving, critical thinking, information processing, learning agility

name: Digital Marketing Assessment
description: Evaluates knowledge and skills in digital marketing strategies and platforms. For marketing specialists and digital campaign managers.
skills: SEO, SEM, social media marketing, content strategy, analytics interpretation, campaign planning

name: Accounting Principles Assessment
description: Measures knowledge of accounting principles and financial reporting. For accounting professionals and financial analysts.
skills: Financial accounting, bookkeeping, GAAP knowledge, financial reporting, auditing principles

name: Business Analyst Assessment
description: Evaluates skills needed for business analysis including requirements gathering and process mapping. For business analysts and systems analysts.
skills: Requirements analysis, process modeling, stakeholder management, solution design, user story creation

name: UX Design Assessment
description: Assesses user experience design capabilities including user research and interface design. For UX/UI designers and product designers.
skills: User research, wireframing, prototyping, usability testing, information architecture
